title: Man charged with stealing Norwich firefighter's helmet
title_page: Man charged with stealing Norwich firefighter's helmet - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been charged with stealing a firefighter's helmet.
Norfolk Fire and Rescue Service said it was taken as a dozen crews tackled a large blaze at a former shoe factory in Norwich last month.
Police said a 48-year-old man had been charged with theft, as well as two further counts of theft from shops in Norwich city centre.
He was released on bail ahead of a hearing at Norwich Magistrates' Court on 11 April.
The fire service previously said the missing helmet prevented an officer from being able to go back to the scene until a replacement was found.
